doc:
Betty Lou Gerson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betty_Lou_Gerson 0 Betty Lou Gerson (April 20, 1914 – January 12, 1999) was an American actress, predominantly active in radio, but also in film and television, and as a voice actress. She is best known as the voice of the villainous, selfish socialite Cruella de Vil from Walt Disney's animated film, One Hundred and One Dalmatians (1961) for which she was named a Disney Legend in 1996. Betty_Lou_Gerson ( April_20_,_1914 – January_12_,_1999 ) was an_American_actress , predominantly_active in radio , but_also in film_and_television , and as a_voice_actress . She is_best_known as the_voice of the_villainous_,_selfish_socialite Cruella de Vil from Walt_Disney 's_animated_film , One_Hundred and One_Dalmatians (_1961_) for which she was_named a_Disney_Legend in 1996 .
